text:
RADIO NEDERLAND
WERELDOMROEP
POSTBUS 222 - TEL. 02950-4741*
TEL. ADR.: MUNDIVOX-HILVERSUM
Dear Mr. Harley,
Below Ifm giving you some travel-
information for October 14th
Departure Amsterdam flight KL 621 - 22. 45
Arrival Hew York (Idlewild) 15 Oct. - 03.00
Departure Idlewild (Helicopter H.Y. 560)- 07.20
Departure Hew York (Hew Ark) H.E. 107 - 09.25
Arrival Washington - 10.38
I hope that you'll have a good trip home and
remain, with kind regards
Yours sincerely,
